QuestData.Title: Minions of Calcinder
QuestData.Description: There is such a thing as digging too deep, $n. While you'll find the richest mineral veins deep below the surface, you'll also find the most evil creatures.$b$bLike fire elementals.$b$bCalcinder's minions roam the cavern ahead. Every one of them holds a piece of Calcinder's evil within it. Slay as many as you can, and show no remorse.
QuestData.RewardText: The remains of Calcinder's minions lie smoldering at your feet. Oilfist will be relieved to hear that you succeeded.
